title: The Decline of Grammar - "Olympian point of view"

content.question: In the third sentence of paragraph 2, "this Olympian point of view" refers specifically to the perspective of one who is

choices.label: considered a master of the English language
able to influence the development of the language
aware of the "historical picture" (second sentence of paragraph 2)
familiar with theories of "continental drift" (third sentence of paragraph 2)

content.answer: aware of the "historical picture" (second sentence of paragraph 2)
